title: Balochistan CM Bugti vows to address public grievances - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
QUETTA: Balochistan Chief Minister Sarfraz Bugti has said that the people of the province are close to his heart and emphasised his commitment to resolving their problems at the local level.

Speaking to the people from his native town Bekar of District Dera Bugti after offering Eidul Azha prayers, the chief minister highlighted the spirit of Eid and said “Eid is a day that promotes brotherhood, solidarity, and love. We should remember the underprivileged around us and include them in our celebrations.” He also distributed Eid gifts among children and sought blessings from the elders.

The chief minister personally greeted the attendees, listened to their concerns, and issued immediate directives to the district administration for the resolution of public issues.

Published in Dawn, June 10th, 2025
